entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Load X509Certificate2 with CreateFromPemFile #93319
  • USE_ARM_INTRINSICS_FOR_CUCKOO_FILTER is not defined for Linux/Mac #93318
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties.Index should be uint #93316
  • Custom Marshaller codefix uses `nint` by default for unmanaged type with no indication that it should be changed #93315
    9.0.0
  • Options Validation source generator runs primary code generation phase on keypress #93313
    9.0.0
  • Logging source generator reruns code generation phase on keypress. #93309
    9.0.0
  • [Metrics] `error.type` doesn't report `Exception.FullName` #93302
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'next != def && "found def after use"' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector128_1.VectorGetAndWithElement__GetAndWithElementInt321:RunReflectionScenario( #93300
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' in 'Runtime_92537:Mul #93299
    9.0.0
  • JIT\Stress\ABI\pinvokes_d tests timed out #93297
    8.0.0
  • Memory Leaks in HttpHandler and the underneath infrastructure #93294
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Canonicalization tests don't build or run #93290
  • Improve Buffer.BulkMoveWithWriteBarrier #93288
  • Augment TensorPrimitives for post-.NET 8 #93286
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient - error An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #93276
    9.0.0
  • Invalid import in `bin/Release/net8.0/browser-wasm/AppBundle/main.mjs` #93274
    8.0.0
  • experiment with running tests in parallel within some collections #93273
    9.0.0
  • blazor publish build fails #93279
  • Test failure System.Data.Tests.DataSetTypedDataSetTest.TypedDataSet #93271
  • Investigate UTF8/UTF16 transcoding with AVX512 #93269
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - AndroidMessageHandler - Cannot access a disposed object #93252
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2Collection.Import() fails with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException: An internal error occurred #92921
    Future
  • Algorithm 'AesGcm' is not supported on this platform but platform is supported #92482
    Future
  • Pointer Type objects IsClass returning unexpected value. #92367
  • Apply `[ExcludeFromCodeCoverage]` to generated code #93236
    Future
  • Missing space for timezone in "en-US" culture LongTimePattern in MacOS Sonoma & .NET 7 #93310
    7.0.x
  • not working httputility #93293
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #93303
    6.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36435: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #93304
    7.0.x
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38171: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #93305
    7.0.x
  • Profiling is not working on Alpine on 8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8 #93122
  • Dotnet 7 can not work with openssl 1.1.1f #89126
    9.0.0
  • DotNet6.0 - Incorrect DateTimeFormat for CultureInfo #93215
    Future
  • Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter fails occasionally #93229
    9.0.0
  • CBOR does not handle canonical NaN correctly #92080
    9.0.0
  • Configuration Binding Generator Initializes Suffixed Default Values Incorrectly #92773
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `Task.FromResult`, but for enumerations #93281
  • Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #84564
    Future
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #93272
  • arm64 altjit and HW intrinsics #77294
    Future
  • System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. (The SSL connection could not be established) #91588

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename JitDisablePgo to JitDisablePGO #93320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix emitOutputLJ trying to encode large displacements #93312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #93307
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • Fix the test template for LoadVectorx* #93301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve a vector implementation to support alignment and non-temporal tores #93296
    area-System.Numerics
  • Make atomics `GenTreeIndir`-derived #93295
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change a few more uses of `new T[]` with a span to collection expressions #93292
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers (#93262) #93291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use collection expression in foreach in CreateManifestAndDescriptors #93289
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Clean up some ifdefs in EventSource #93287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [RISC-V] Fix dropping NaN sign and payload when importing float constants #93285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Resolve asset URL only once #93275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Entitle macOS executables while building #92967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Obsolete `AuthenticationManager` of `System.Net.Requests` #93171
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Enable ldp reordering for TYP_FLOAT #93248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand CreateSpan in T0 #91403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #93306
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` #93255
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.` in Methodical_r2.sh-deep_array_nz_r.dll when DOTNET_GCStress=4. #93186
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Second try at using C11 atomics #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [android][ios] Fix dispose problem with NativeHttpHandlers #93262
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use Sync Send methods in Sync HttpClient tests #93139
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock jump target private #93152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Decimal literal formatting in source generators #93160
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Delete docs/design/features/cross-platform-cryptography.md #93270
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve tests for exponential trim analysis problems #93232
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Make it easy to run blazor startup measurements #93209
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make Emitted Attribute Order Deterministic in Options Source Generator #93260
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve disk full test #92682
    area-System.IO
  • Enable DotNETRuntimePrivate provider #93245
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adjust the DNS lookup duration metric #93254
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Skip Jitted Methods Counting Test when DOTNET_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 #93264
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Speed up calling interface methods #93100
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix memory leak in MemoryCache #92550
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement LoadAndInsertScalar APIs #93197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] drop `create_task_callback` and `mono_wasm_marshal_promise` #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add SuppressSingleFileAnalysisWarnings option to ILC and use it in runtime tests #93200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Avoid membarrier on lower Android versions #93096
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Make a copy of assembly path. #93253
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Handle binding to initialized abstract members #93120
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93193
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated #92684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • WIP: experimental LoadLibrary monitoring in CoreCLR native runtime #93258
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalarNx2 for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Reference live ILLink analyzer #93259
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [QUIC] Cleaned up TlsSecret and added test. #93119
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove a few unnecessary `unsafe` keyword uses in TensorPrimitives #93219
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some issues for CoreRoot test cases: #93187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [MT][browser] Allow CI failures on library MT tests #93224
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
